text: A cargo ship or freighter is any kind of ship that carries cargo, goods, and materials from one port to another. Thousands of cargo carriers travel on the world's seas and oceans each year, and handle most international trade. Cargo ships are usually specially designed for a special task, often carrying tools like cranes to load and unload. They come in all sizes. ==Other websites== * Freighter travel at Wikivoyage * Vessel size groups == References == Category:Ship types
title: Freighter
